label: Bug-3
title: Invalid Obj_Id in created_by field causes API errors
description: Issues created with 'claude-code' as created_by value fail validation because Obj_Id requires exactly 8 hexadecimal characters. The API returns error: 'value provided was not a valid Obj_Id: claude-code'

properties.error_message: in Obj_Id: value provided was not a valid Obj_Id: claude-code
